name: Rescue the City (PRAJWAL)
description:
let's play something interesting and not get board during this tense period due to outbreak of corona virus!  

Made for Nikhil Malankar game jam

City Rescue is a 2d top-down but fake 3d game with twists and turns to keep you entertained  

isolate infected people, blast the vaccine, have fun watching and interacting with the city

every aspect of this game is entertaining, enjoy ;) 

Also it has many bugs which may be fixed, or not ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ 

Credits :   

All sprites except "Explosion.png" are made by me within the jam period.
